#{matchedBankLocationName}, #{matchedCustBankCode}, #{refundFlag}, #{icbcSignRespMsg}, #{fgResultOutLibrary}, #{currentBankReturnResult}, #{belongAreaMatched}, #{belongAreaMatchRule}, #{sourceBankReturnCode}, #{sourceBankReturnMsg})

values(PRD_NAME) , SIGN_TRANS = values(SIGN_TRANS) , MATCHED_AREA_CODE = values(MATCHED_AREA_CODE) , MATCHED_BANK_LOCATION_CODE = values(MATCHED_BANK_LOCATION_CODE) , MATCHED_BANK_LOCATION_NAME = FG_RESULT_OUT_LIBRARY = values(FG_RESULT_OUT_LIBRARY) , CURRENT_BANK_RETURN_RESULT = values(CURRENT_BANK_RETURN_RESULT) , BELONG_AREA_MATCHED = values(BELONG_AREA_MATCHED) , BELONG_AREA_MATCH_RULE = values(BELONG_AREA_MATCH_RULE) , SOURCE_BANK_RETURN_CODE = values(SOURCE_BANK_RETURN_CODE) , SOURCE_BANK_RETURN_MSG = values(SOURCE_BANK_RETURN_MSG)
